website_summaries.verdict: Children and adults alike will enjoy the nostalgic graphics and the gourmet milk chocolates.
pros: Contains both candy and poem behind windows
2.65 ounces of high quality milk chocolate
cons: Chocolate pieces can fall to bottom of box
Pieces may be outdated or heat-damaged

customer_reviews.title: Chocolates too Loose
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate tastes good and its definitely good value for the money. However, Chocolates were so loose that they were floating around in the cardboard box and it took all the fun out of opening one window per day :( would love to buy this again next year if they can figure out a way to keep the chocolates where they are.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby L Porter

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. I purchased 9 advent calendars. Only 3 were delivered to my address but they were all defective. All the candy had come loose from their spots behind the little doors and had fallen to the bottom. The whole effect of the advent calendar surprise of finding a candy each day was completely ruined. The calendar is near useless. NEXT YEAR I WILL PURCHASE LOCALLY WHERE I CAN TELL IF THE CALENDARS ARE DEFECTIVE! DO NOT PURCHASE FROM THIS COMPANY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce H Beck

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Advent Calendars
customer_reviews.text: Second year I have order these Calendars. My grandchildren look forward to opening the doors each day. Excellent holiday treat. Beautiful themes too. These arrived the next day in perfect condition. I really recommend this company and their products.
customer_reviews.author: ph

customer_reviews.title: Great calendars for kids!!
customer_reviews.text: These advent calendars are great, especially for the money. I ordered 3 advent calendars together with a few other items. Everything was shipped in the same box and all of my calendars arrived in good condition. My kids loved them. I will definitely be getting these again next year. I don't understand why there are so many bad reviews. I understand it when people received the calendars with damage, but outside of that I really don't get it. I was actually nervous about ordering these because of some of the negative reviews. I am glad I took the chance. It was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother ordering
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for my kids remembering them from my own childhood. But the dates on the doors are scrambled and not at all in order as a calendar should be. The chocolates were shaken up out of their little doors and sometimes when my kids open a door it's empty and I have to dig and shake to find a piece of candy for them. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Fox

customer_reviews.title: I feel really ripped off !!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on Amazon these 2 calenders for $13.99 . Today I went shopping in ALDI - and could not believe that a product absolute similar to what I got, is sold for $1.29 each. And be aware- once you ordered there is no free return . Return for this is $5.99 - more than 3 calenders from ALDI. By the way the chocolate in the ALDI products is Made in Germany excellent quality !
customer_reviews.author: Rudolf Stock

customer_reviews.title: Chocolates don't match pictures
customer_reviews.text: When you open each window there is a chocolate. Each chocolate has a picture on it. The picture on the chocolate does not match the picture in the window underneath the chocolate. For example, the chocolate had a picture of a stocking, but when you removed the chocolate, underneath is a picture of a tree. None of the chocolates match the picture. Otherwise we like the Santa pic on ours.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahtx78

customer_reviews.title: I order these every year for the kids and this ...
customer_reviews.text: I order these every year for the kids and this time the packages arrived with the chocolates all over and not in their spots. The kids opened the bottom of the boxes to get the chocolates out. This kind of defeats the purpose of the kids opening the windows to get their chocolates out and anxiously counting down the days until Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The chocolates fell out of their molds.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always ordered advent calendars from Amazon and I’ve always been happy with them. However; this year my kid opened the first day and all was well but, after that all of the chocolates have fallen out of their individual molds. The calendar hadn’t been dropped or jostled. He still opens the windows but, now has to dig for a Chocolate! Not, the end of the world but, pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J.

customer_reviews.title: Candies all loose.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for my grandchildren and I am very disappointed with them. The little chocolates should be sealed in their little compartments instead of being loose. All of the chocolates are at the bottom of the box and I will have to have the grandkids reach to the bottom of the box to get their chocolate each night. The candies need to be sealed in each box. This is probably due to shipping and should have been considered before hand. The chocolates could easily be sealed with one large piece of cellophane over the whole plastic holder and then parents could just cut the one candy piece out each night.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Barb

customer_reviews.title: Do not order
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have time to shop for an advent calendar for my grandson, as I usually do, so I ordered this one on Amazon. Big mistake. All of the candies behind the doors were no longer in their positions, but had fallen to the bottom of the calendar. Each night, my grandson opened a door to find nothing behind it, and had to shake the calendar to get a candy to fall out of one of the doors. The chocolate was of very poor quality, and had turned white, like it was very old. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The candy is in there loose & floating around. When you open a numbered door, nothing there. Unless it's on the bottom of the box. DONT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Uma

customer_reviews.title: Floating chocolates but still a great buy
customer_reviews.text: It's not a countdown but open by date so 1 for Dec 1st and 24 for Christmas Eve. The chocolates did bounce around inside as the cardboard is not glued down to the plastic liner but it's still a great product. I love the picture, the pieces of the story behind the doors, and my kids love the chocolates even if they moved a bit.
customer_reviews.author: melissa clark

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Chocolates will fall to the bottom if you drop or shake around like normal children would do. My kids were bummed every time they opened a little window and discovered the chocolate missing. They fall out easily... won't purchase again since I found them at Walgreens for $2
customer_reviews.author: Island MarieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The calendar arrived with all the chocolate mixed up and at the bottom. The kids were so disappointed when they opened each day. I will never order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Some of the chocolates where broken and down in the bottom. Glue wasn’t holding them in place so I had to open them up and reglue them down. After that they worked fine. Quality of material and chocolate was very poor. Like dollar tree thing. I’d gladly pay a $1 but $6 was too much.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Koweno

customer_reviews.title: Great value and appearance
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Advent calendar, especially for the price. Can’t really comment on the candy as grandkids haven’t opened them yet. Fast delivery, well-packed. I’ll buy again next year.
customer_reviews.author: John in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Half the chocolate.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered advent calendars online to be prepared early for Christmas. Its too bad this calendar came with about half the chocolate it was supposed to. Quite a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Weilacher

customer_reviews.title: disqppointing for grandchild
customer_reviews.text: The pockets behind the door were collapsed and the little candies were ground up. Very upset by this,
customer_reviews.author: D. MORGAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice calendars if chocolates would have stayed put...
customer_reviews.text: While i like the pic and the chocolate, all the chocolates fell out and when we open the windows, most of them look empty. Quite a deception for my kid.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna W.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t order this one again. Some of the numbers were missing chocolate
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Kids are on pins and needles with excitment.
customer_reviews.text: The picture is beautiful, it hasn't been used yet since it's not Dec. 1 yet. The kids look forward to this every year.
customer_reviews.author: Renate

customer_reviews.title: Disappionted
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews. Great concept, something my daughter in law had as a child so I thought it would be a great tradition for the grandson. Opened day one, no chocolate. All the chocolates were at the bottom of the box. Takes all the fun out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Missing chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate was all over not in the spots. Also had chocolate missing.
customer_reviews.author: tiff

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: this is very fun! We get these every year and they're still fun even NOW! I don't even like chocolate but yet I still got one. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mateo

customer_reviews.title: Buy from the store
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate fell out of place. I had to remove every piece, and place it in something I made. I won’t buy one of these again.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not good, the chocolate tastes bad, and they are all passable. They are not in their own position, very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: ZHUO

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Received this calandar and waited until Dec.1st to open the first door. When my daughter opened the door nothing was there. So we opened a few more doors, nothing. All of the chocolates had fallen to the bottom. I will not be buying another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fix packaging
customer_reviews.text: I have a very disappointed seven year old. All of the candy shifted in the box and the calendar can’t be used. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: Good way to start a tradition
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and husband enjoyed opening this together after he got home from work every night. The quality of chocolate wasnt great but for a kid they don't care lol
customer_reviews.author: Eri235

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this purchase. When I removed the packages from the delivery box all the chocolate slid to the bottom of the packages. The candy is rolling around the packages. It's going to be difficult to have an advent calendar when the chocolate isnt in the areas it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Chasdity

customer_reviews.title: Makes Christmas Fun
customer_reviews.text: These make the Christmas Holiday Season! Our children, and now our grandchildren get these every Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Robb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift to give
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift so no idea if the chocolate tastes good. The packaging and graphics are high quality so would think the product would be high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Washburn

customer_reviews.title: All of the chocolate fell out
customer_reviews.text: That chocolates were all shaken around when we received it. We opened day 1 and there was no chocolate... had to shake the whole thing until we got a random one to fall out. We'll keep using it because it's the only one I could find, but not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Non of the candies are behind the windows, they are all loose.
customer_reviews.author: Geri Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate was all white and gross.
customer_reviews.text: Something happened in transit, chocolate was totally grey and yucky. Had to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Birdman

customer_reviews.title: Need better packaging
customer_reviews.text: It would have been exactly what I was looking for but all of the chocolates were at the bottom and not in the “doors” so when they opened it up it was empty (and a pain to get them all back in their spots).
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Could be shipping, but most chocolates became dislodged from there spot.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrive broken. Chocolates all at bottom of box expect a few. Defeats the purpose of this style calender I enjoyed when I was a kid. Sorry kids, good things it's still November and have time to try another calander befor December starts.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for christmas
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Every chocolate is different :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: JUNK! Chocolates aren’t in their correct places!
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk! We opened the first window and there was an empty space where the chocolate should be. The chocolates had all shifted out of place. I had to open the entire box and reload all of the chocolates into their designated windows.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Wood

customer_reviews.title: I’m disappointed for the kids it doesn’t have chocolates like supposed to
customer_reviews.text: The first two days have had no chocolate and that is kinda upsetting for the kids
customer_reviews.author: Brian Burton

customer_reviews.title: great advent
customer_reviews.text: such beautiful picture with many cute details. I don't care much for the lyrics behind each chocolate, but the chocolate is nice.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Not so happy. None of the chocolates were actually in the different calendar day boxes when I got it they were all loose and just floating around in the box. Just plain cheap ugh
customer_reviews.author: Rhema

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these for my grandchildren and the candy is at the bottom of the calendar. So when they go to open the first window, the candy will have to be retrieved from the bottom by cutting a hole!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A Pixler

customer_reviews.title: Good calendar
customer_reviews.text: Nice calendar all chocolates were in place great price cant beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L

customer_reviews.title: Grandchildren Love Them
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love these. Arrived on time and taste of chocolate is fairly good.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Greattach little gift for christmas season.
customer_reviews.text: Great for grandkids. They totally love it and priced right. I got two so they wouldn't fight over the days chocolate
customer_reviews.author: C. Family

customer_reviews.title: Better than the elf
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten this every year for my child and he loves it so much. By the end he knows the night before Christmas by heart
customer_reviews.author: ThisMommaSpendsTooMuch

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Ok product for the money, but all of the chocolates fell into the bottom of the calendar so there wasn't one each day. Not the worst product and my kid enjoyed it but that is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My opinion
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for but all the chocolates had fallen out of their squares upon arrival so it’s Been ridiculous when opening up each day. We have to shake the boxes to get the chocolate to pop up through the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Spears

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate fell to the bottom and was melted
customer_reviews.text: It came and all the chocolates were on the bottom....
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Maville

customer_reviews.title: but they said the chocolate is not good.
customer_reviews.text: Calendar is cute. I bought this for my daughter and her cousin, but they said the chocolate is not good.
customer_reviews.author: fmb

customer_reviews.title: Do not order
customer_reviews.text: Melted in the bottom of the calendar and missing chocolate went to walgreens to buy new. Do not order
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was all flimsy and mangled. The candy was all out of the places it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Brown

customer_reviews.title: This came with the chocolates scattered all over behind the ...
customer_reviews.text: This came with the chocolates scattered all over behind the actual slots. So when we open the door the chocolate may or may not be there. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Candy was loose all in the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews first. All the candy fell out of the holes and into the bottom of the calendar. Go to literally any store in person and buy one, it’s worth a trip to get one in person.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M. Kerven

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay in spot
customer_reviews.text: It came and the chocolate wasn't even where they should've been, they don't stay in their spot.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Holley

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged, chocolates all loose
customer_reviews.text: Product was received damaged, all the chocolates were loose and moving inside the package
customer_reviews.author: carlsbad

customer_reviews.title: Refund
customer_reviews.text: Called and had to send it back as it was defective when I got it
customer_reviews.author: Laura DeVries

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts, delicious chocolate
customer_reviews.text: This is the second year I have ordered the chocolate advents for delivery to my adult children. Great gifts, quick delivery and wonderful chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: SusanR58

customer_reviews.title: Candies were all rattling around in the box. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Candies were all rattling around in the box. I had to take it apart and put it back together. It had to stay flat or the candies would fall out again.
customer_reviews.author: wmpend

customer_reviews.title: Pieces fall
customer_reviews.text: The individual days fell to bottom of container after a few days were opened. The container had to be opened and pieces reordered but got put in wrong places ultimately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: All the chocolates fell out of their spots and there were two short.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible!! All the chocolates fell to the bottom and it’s useless. Just wasted the $$ I paid for it. Totally disappointed. Will NEVER order again. Hopefully, I can save someone future headache.
customer_reviews.author: Catharine Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Grey Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Great in theory. But chocolate grey and crumbled. To Amazon’s credit, I got a refund. And perhaps you’ll have better luck. But be warned.
customer_reviews.author: NDA

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 calendars to 2 different addresses and all 3 were delivered with the chocolate at the Bottom of them. With no way to get them into the individual spots they were useless!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: All of the chocolates were at the bottom. So every time my son opened a day he had to shake it around to fish out a chocolate. We won’t be buying these next year.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle H

customer_reviews.title: Kids love Advent
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this Advent Calendar every year. This one is great for the little ones!
customer_reviews.author: C D Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed Opened the box and all the candy is at the bottom. Not by the numbered windows to be opened. Don’t waste your time or money. Would give 0 stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: Barb H.

customer_reviews.title: Old chocolate
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate looked very old. The piece that we opened was white and chalky. Now I have to send this back, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Chocolates were good
customer_reviews.text: When they opened each door the chocolates had fallen out of their windows. Had to take it apart and put the chocolates in each window were they belonged.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Arbuckle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, nieces and nephews look forward to receiving their advent calendars from me the first of every December!
customer_reviews.author: E Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It was put all in one box and it got smashed and open on the back side and the candy at the bottom of the box
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Cute advent calendar but all of the chocolates fell to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: The candies are all scattered in there so on December 1st when my kiddo opens there will be no candy there
customer_reviews.author: Marie E Ellensohn

customer_reviews.title: literally a waste
customer_reviews.text: all the chocolates arrived at the bottom of the display. its awful and ruined what I had planned for my child's 2nd christmas. Thanks for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: shae morin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to display and read
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed it very much. I liked the milk chocolate and reading the little story each day. Beautiful picture to display.
customer_reviews.author: eg

customer_reviews.title: Contents!
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed with this. Bought it as a gift and with only 7 days into it found 2 empty squares!
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate falls to the bottom
customer_reviews.text: All of the chocolate falls to the bottom of the calendar. So when the kids open up their days, there is no chocolate
customer_reviews.author: Teal Mead

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with all of the chocolate out of the molds and at the bottom of the package. Replacement arrived two weeks into December. Not good for an advent calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate was all in the bottom and broken. I paid good money for this why. Rip off
customer_reviews.author: Malisa F. Hipshur

customer_reviews.title: Hmm
customer_reviews.text: I can hear the chocolate inside is broken, and moving around but I'm sure my kids will enjoy either way.
customer_reviews.author: Rashelle Young

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate all over the place
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate isn’t even in the molds. All rushes to bottom. Just buy one in store.

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: arrived and the chocolates were loose and flying around inside calendar. unable to use, wouldn't give this to and child.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Very nice picture and the numbers are easy to find. My granddaughter loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: If you love your chocolate don't buy this. The presentation is really good

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My boys were really excited to see their new Advent Calenders. They are really neat

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love This!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fun for grandkids to open a door a day up until Christmas.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: my daughter wanted and liked it. Do I have to add anything?

customer_reviews.title: If I could rate it 0 stars I would
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate was all loose not in the individual advent days... POOR QUALITY

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: All of the chocolates have fallen out of their slots, this product is useless!

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two for my kids, both had come apart on the inside causing the candy to fall to the bottom.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed

customer_reviews.title: Good user interface.
customer_reviews.text: An efficient chocolate delivery system that worked reliably during its service life. Well made. Don't bother with the extended warranty.

product_meta.title: Naughty or Nice Chocolate Advent Calendar (Countdown to Christmas)
product_meta.description: Size:1 PackEnjoy counting down to Christmas with this fun Chocolate Advent calendar. Join Santa Claus in front of the fire while he checks his list one last time! Prepare for Christmas by opening a window each day during Advent. Upon opening each window, find a wonderful piece of gourmet milk chocolate. Also find a verse from Twas the Night Before Christmas.Each Advent calendar contains 2.6 ounces of chocolate and measures 10"x13 3/4". Chocolate Advent calendars may contain traces of peanuts, other nuts, gluten, egg and cereals.
feature_bullets: Chocolate & 'Twas the Night Poem Behind Each Window
A Vermont Christmas Company Original Advent Calendar

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars476 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
